entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light before morning. Low minus 10. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Sunday 01 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 60%
